title: POLYTE Premium Lint Free Microfiber Washcloth Face Towel, 13 x 13 in, Set of 6 (White)
features: Experience the plush and super soft feeling of microfiber cloths for healthier looking skin
Ultra absorbent dual pile (one side long fiber/one side short fiber) microfiber removes makeup, dirt, and oil from your body and face gentler than traditional fibers
Cloths will quickly dry when hanging to help prevent the formation of odors
Use damp with only water for gentle exfoliation and removing dead skin cells and impurities
Use with body wash or bar of soap for a superior lather and a completely clean face and body
description: If we may, would you care for some wonderful washcloths? We created them just for you, so you can experience a PLUSH and SUPER SOFT feeling on the skin without the heft and bulk. They are infused with GENTLE EXFOLIATING properties to effectively remove dead skin cells. SUPERIOR LATHER with bar soaps or body washes. Cloths, themselves, DRY QUICKLY to RESIST ODORS. Allow us to share how to EASILY CARE for these wonderful cloths. Recommend washing separately to prevent collecting lint or debris from other garments and textiles. Please hand or machine wash in warm water with like colors and air dry or dry on the low setting. Recommend using wool dryer balls to reduce any static when drying. We ask you not use fabric softener, bleach, dryer sheets or the towels may become less wonderful.
Size Large: 13 inches by 13 inches or 33 cm by 33 cm  Color: white Weave: dual pile terry Edges/Trim: polyester with rounded corners Includes: 6 cloths
